p: Total RNA was isolated from three different developmental stages of Tartary buckwheat seeds by using the EASYspin Plus Plant RNA Kit (Aidlab, Beijing, China) and digested by DNase I (TaKaRa, Dalian, China) to remove the genomic DNA. Then, 2 μg total RNA was reverse transcribed into single-stranded cDNA using the miRcute miRNA First-Strand cDNA Synthesis Kit (Tiangen, Beijing, China) following the manufacturer’s instructions. The qRT-PCR was performed on a CFX96 Real-time System (BIO-RAD, USA) using the miRcute Plus miRNA qPCR Kit (SYBR Green) (Tiangen, Beijing, China). Three independent biological replicates were used, and the FtU6 was used as the reference gene. The relative expression level of each miRNA was calculated by using the 2 −ΔΔCt method. All primers used in this experiment are listed in Additional file 1: Table S12.
